summary: Enhanced Dawnguard faction armor and shields. All textures enhanced. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
Enhanced Dawnguard faction armor. All textures 2x vanilla. 
I was playing Dawnguard when I realized the armors, while awesome, were rather low res, so I quick hopped in photoshop and after a few hours this is what I designed. Note: I have no experience with normal maps so I did my best to enhance the armors with what I had and the result is decent if I do say so myself. 
I hope you enjoy and endorse. A big thanks to Bethesda for making one awesome expansion, can\'t wait for the next! As always: keep playing Skyrim!
Don\'t forget to post screenshots!
My page and other mods: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/931897
author: Dystortion
